detail_desc: Shirt in an airy cotton and linen weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fully lined twill 5-pocket trousers in a cotton blend with an adjustable elasticated waist and detachable fabric belt. Jersey lining.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and cutaway coverage at the back.

Set with a soft, non-wired bra and a pair of briefs in lace. Bra with adjustable shoulder straps, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners. Briefs with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Plastic gift box containing five adjustable metal rings with various decorations.
Long-sleeved lace blouse with a stand-up collar and concealed zip at the back. Decorative scalloped trim around the collar, cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a square neckline and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Low-cut back with a cut-out section and horizontal ties, a gathered seam at the waist and a voluminous, flared skirt.
Top in a viscose crêpe weave with short sleeves and a rounded hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, button fly and slim, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Slingbacks in imitation suede with cut-out sections, pointed toes and an elasticated strap around the heel. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 7.5 cm.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, one back pocket, decorative stitching on the legs and ribbed hems.

Cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders and extra-long sleeves. Stocking-stitched lapels and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight legs with creases.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, round neckline and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Off-the-shoulder, calf-length dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave with elastication at the top, 3/4-length sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, an elasticated waist, and skirt with gathered seams. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist and lined gusset.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric. Lined front with removable inserts, a racer back and a wide elastic hem. Extra firm support.
Scarf in a soft, fine knit with fringes on the short sides.

Calf-length, sleeveless dress with a lace top and pleated skirt in an airy weave. Round neck, narrow elasticated seam at the waist with a lace flounce, and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch denim decorated with small sparkly stones at the front. Adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and narrow hems.
Fine-knit dress in a soft cotton blend with long sleeves and patch front pockets. Unlined.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Bomber jacket in shimmering, patterned satin with a zip down the front, long raglan sleeves and welt front pockets. Small, ribbed stand-up collar with a glittery edge, and the same ribbing with a glittery edge at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
Fine-knit jumper with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Joggers in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, side pockets and wide, straight legs.

Shirt in washed linen with a cutaway collar, French front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Waterproof hi-top trainers in imitation leather and mesh with a hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles. The trainers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top. Seam with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist, long, slightly wider cuffed sleeves and a flared skirt. Lined at the front of the bodice.
Large scarf in a soft weave with short fringes along the edges.

Wide blouse in a crinkled modal and cotton weave with embroidery, a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with gathers front and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Relaxed-fit joggers in stretch cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Elasticated drawstring waist, a fake fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbing at the hems.
Long-sleeved dress in soft velour made from a cotton blend with a seam at the waist and wide flounce at the hem.
Trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, fake pockets and long legs with a tab and button.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Narrow Alice band in twisted metal.
Straight-cut jacket in sturdy jersey with notch lapels, buttons at the front and patch front pockets. Unlined.
Knee-length shorts in soft washed cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Wide trousers in a wool weave. High waist with belt loops and pleats for added width, a zip fly and hook-and-eye fasteners, and discreet side pockets.
Short jersey dress with a small gathered collar and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and long, cuffed sleeves. Unlined.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with a high polo neck, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs and reflective details.
Knee-length dress in a patterned, cotton crêpe weave with a V-neck, wrapover front and short, wide sleeves. Seam at the waist with a button at one side and a flounced seam at the hem. Unlined.
Hooded jacket in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, side pockets and ribbed cuffs. Brushed inside.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a glittery print motif on the front.
Sandals in imitation suede with lacing at the front, a high shaft with hole-patterned sides, and covered heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 9 cm.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a brushed finish. High waist and a concealed zip in one side. Recycled polyester lining.
Set with a dress and leggings in soft cotton jersey. Sleeveless dress with a print motif, gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Knee-length leggings with an elasticated waist.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Boxer briefs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Short jersey shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Flared, calf-length skirt in imitation leather. High waist with press-studs and a concealed zip at one side, and visible seams front and back. Unlined.
Short, straight-cut coat in wool with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, side pockets and a detachable tie belt. Satin lining.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and ribbed hems.
Shaftless socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.
Thong briefs in lace with a mid waist and lined gusset.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and fluted soles.
Trainer socks in a fast-drying, functional fine knit with elastication at the top and silicone on the inside of the heels for a better fit.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a printed front and round neckline with a narrow trim.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 65x195 cm.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with smocking and elastication at the top. 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce, and a smocked hem.

Tuxedo trousers woven in a cotton blend containing some linen with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with grosgrain stripes down the sides and creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Hat in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a ribbed hem.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft jersey. Wide-fitting, short-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Patterned shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Fitted vest top in organic cotton jersey with spaghetti straps and a narrow lace trim at the top.
Scrunchie in soft velvet with long ties.
Skinny-fit, ankle-length trousers with a high, adjustable, elasticated waist, zip in one side and narrow hems.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves. hole-knit sections and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
